title: Hardware & Embedded Security
description: In specific, Silent Data Corruption. Investigating physical memory attacks and defenses in embedded systems and IoT devices. Developing practical security solutions for resource-constrained environments to protect critical infrastructure.

title: AI Ethics & Human-Machine Interaction
description: Studying ethical AI design and socio-technical resilience. Examining governance mechanisms for AI systems and developing decision-support tools aligned with human values.

title: Applied Cryptography & Responsible Innovation
description: Exploring misuse-resistant cryptographic APIs and secure protocol design. Making strong cryptography accessible to developers through secure-by-default systems and policy frameworks.

title: Critical Infrastructure Resilience
description: Examining failure modes in complex socio-technical systems. Developing graceful degradation strategies under attack and recovery mechanisms for essential services.

title: Security Governance & Policy
description: Developing policy frameworks and standards that encourage responsible innovation. Creating incentive structures for security investment in emerging technologies.

title: Cybersecurity Education at Scale
description: Designing curriculum and hands-on lab experiences. Making advanced security concepts accessible to working professionals through project-driven, interdisciplinary approaches.
